20101220060517.667|20101220060519.333|CCO|WHY?
20101220060519.333|20101220060521.000|CCO|I DON'T KNOW.

20101220060534.333|20101220060537.667|CCO|PISTOL, AND NO WITNESSES BEYOND

20101220060545.000|20101220060547.000|CCO|WINDOW AND HAD SEEN SMOKE COMING
20101220060547.000|20101220060549.000|CCO|FROM THE MOBILE HOME BELOW.
20101220060549.000|20101220060551.000|CCO|WHEN SHE HAD DRIVEN DOWN THE 
20101220060551.000|20101220060552.667|CCO|HILL, SHE SAID, SHE PUT OUT A 
20101220060552.667|20101220060554.333|CCO|FIRE INSIDE THE TRAILER, A FIRE 
20101220060554.333|20101220060556.000|CCO|APPARENTLY SET NEAR THE WOOD 
20101220060556.000|20101220060557.667|CCO|STOVE TO CONSUME THE EVIDENCE OF
20101220060557.667|20101220060559.333|CCO|THE KILLINGS.
20101220060559.333|20101220060601.000|CCO|SHE FOUND THE BODIES.
20101220060601.000|20101220060603.500|CCO|AND AT 3:57 PM, SHE CALLED 911.
20101220060603.500|20101220060606.000|CCO|DESPITE THE LACK OF EVIDENCE, 
20101220060606.000|20101220060608.500|CCO|INVESTIGATORS SOON DISCOVERED 
20101220060608.500|20101220060611.000|CCO|INFORMATION THEY THOUGHT MIGHT 
20101220060611.000|20101220060613.500|CCO|HELP IDENTIFY THE KILLER.

20101220060616.000|20101220060618.500|CCO|SMILE WHO WAS LOVED BY EVERYONE

20101220060621.000|20101220060622.429|CCO|DEALER WITH PLANS, POLICE SAID,

20101220060625.286|20101220060626.714|CCO|CONVICTIONS AND A NEW ARREST

20101220060629.571|20101220060631.000|CCO|BEEN INVOLVED IN A NUMBER OF 
20101220060631.000|20101220060633.500|CCO|DRUG DEAL THAT IS WENT WRONG

20101220060636.000|20101220060638.500|CCO|AGAINST JASON KINSER'S LIFE. 
20101220060638.500|20101220060641.000|CCO|>> THERE WERE PEOPLE WHO TOLD

20101220060644.000|20101220060645.000|CCO|INVESTIGATIVE REPORTER FOR A TV 
20101220060645.000|20101220060646.000|CCO|STATION IN PORTLAND AT THE TIME

20101220060647.000|20101220060648.000|CCO|THREE PEOPLE WERE KILLED THAT 
20101220060648.000|20101220060649.000|CCO|DAY.

20101220060650.000|20101220060651.000|CCO|>> POLICE THOUGHT AT THE TIME 
20101220060651.000|20101220060652.429|CCO|THAT JASON KINSER WAS THE

20101220060656.714|20101220060658.143|CCO|>> THAT'S RIGHT.
20101220060658.143|20101220060659.571|CCO|SO, I THINK WHEN YOU START 
20101220060659.571|20101220060701.000|CCO|RUNNING THROUGH THIS LIST OF 
20101220060701.000|20101220060704.333|CCO|NAMES, BUSHWHACKER, DUCT TAPE 
20101220060704.333|20101220060707.667|CCO|MIKE, NAZI RED.

20101220060715.286|20101220060716.714|CCO|KILL JASON KINSER.

20101220060719.571|20101220060721.000|CCO|GOOD ON. 
20101220060721.000|20101220060723.500|CCO|>> ONE OF THE VICTIMS HAD 
20101220060723.500|20101220060726.000|CCO|RECENTLY FACED DRUG CHARGES.

20101220060728.500|20101220060731.000|CCO|RELEASED DAYS BEFORE HER MURDER

20101220060732.429|20101220060733.857|CCO|HER SISTER, JENNIFER. 
20101220060733.857|20101220060735.286|CCO|>> SHE WAS A LOVING, CARING 
20101220060735.286|20101220060736.714|CCO|PERSON WITH A GOOD SOUL. 
20101220060736.714|20101220060738.143|CCO|>> WHAT WAS SHE UP TO WHEN YOU 
20101220060738.143|20101220060739.571|CCO|LAST TALKED TO HER?

20101220060741.000|20101220060743.500|CCO|PEOPLE, DOING THE WRONG THINGS. 
20101220060743.500|20101220060746.000|CCO|>> FOR SUSAN OSBOURNE'S FAMILY 
20101220060746.000|20101220060748.500|CCO|AS WELL, THE FACT THAT DRUGS MAY

20101220060753.000|20101220060755.000|CCO|MYSTERY. 
20101220060755.000|20101220060757.000|CCO|>> AND YOUR DAUGHTER NEVER 
20101220060757.000|20101220060759.000|CCO|MENTIONED ANYTHING TO DO WITH 
20101220060759.000|20101220060801.000|CCO|DRUGS OR ANYONE EVEN BEING ANGRY

20101220060802.667|20101220060804.333|CCO|ENEMIES?
20101220060804.333|20101220060806.000|CCO|>> SHE TOLD IRENE ONE TIME WHEN 
20101220060806.000|20101220060807.667|CCO|THEY WERE SITTING IN THE KITCHEN

20101220060809.333|20101220060811.000|CCO|OFTEN, THAT SHE WAS SCARED,

20101220061241.000|20101220061244.333|CCO|THREE MURDER VICTIMS, CELESTA

20101220061256.000|20101220061258.500|CCO|AROUND THIS SCENE.

20101220061301.000|20101220061303.500|CCO|TARGET AND SUSAN AND CELESTA

20101220061306.000|20101220061308.500|CCO|>> WHY DOES SOMETHING LIKE THIS

20101220061422.667|20101220061424.333|CCO|WAS ENOUGH.

20101220064019.571|20101220064021.000|CCO|>> IT IS. 
20101220064021.000|20101220064023.500|CCO|>> BUT FOR SOME MYSTERIOUS 
20101220064023.500|20101220064026.000|CCO|REASON, TOM McMAHON WAS NEVER 
20101220064026.000|20101220064028.500|CCO|PURSUED FURTHER AS A MURDER 
20101220064028.500|20101220064031.000|CCO|SUSPECT OR CALLED AS A WITNESS 
20101220064031.000|20101220064032.667|CCO|AT CANNON'S TRIAL.

20101220064034.333|20101220064036.000|CCO|WHY, BUT THE POLK COUNTY SHERIFF

20101220064657.667|20101220064659.333|CCO|THE KILLER.

20101220064701.000|20101220064702.429|CCO|TRIAL HEARD FROM AN EXPERT IN

20101220064703.857|20101220064705.286|CCO|ANALYSIS.

20101220064706.714|20101220064708.143|CCO|CHANCES OF THE BULLETS IN 
20101220064708.143|20101220064709.571|CCO|CANNON'S GARAGE, CONTAINING THE

20101220064715.000|20101220064717.000|CCO|SO IT SEEMED BACK THEN.

20101220065251.000|20101220065253.000|CCO|>>> IN SEPTEMBER 2009, SCOTT 
20101220065253.000|20101220065255.000|CCO|CANNON LEFT THE OREGON STATE 
20101220065255.000|20101220065257.000|CCO|PENITENTIARY.
20101220065257.000|20101220065259.000|CCO|HE TRAVELED LESS THAN 20 MILES 
20101220065259.000|20101220065301.000|CCO|ACROSS THE RIVER TO THE SMALL 
20101220065301.000|20101220065303.000|CCO|TOWN OF DALLAS, OREGON, WHERE 
20101220065303.000|20101220065305.000|CCO|NEARLY A DECADE BEFORE, HE HAD 
20101220065305.000|20101220065307.000|CCO|BEEN TRIED, CONVICTED AND 
20101220065307.000|20101220065309.000|CCO|SENTENCED TO LIFE IN PRISON 
20101220065309.000|20101220065311.000|CCO|WITHOUT PAROLE.
20101220065311.000|20101220065313.000|CCO|BUT WHEN HE RETURNED TO A 
20101220065313.000|20101220065315.000|CCO|COURTROOM, IT WAS CLEAR THAT 
20101220065315.000|20101220065317.000|CCO|AUTHOIES IN POLK COUNTY WERE 
20101220065317.000|20101220065319.000|CCO|INTENT ON TRYING HIM ONCE AGAIN 
20101220065319.000|20101220065321.000|CCO|ON THOSE THREE MURDER COUNTS.
20101220065321.000|20101220065323.000|CCO|IT APPEARED CANNON COULD SIT IN 
20101220065323.000|20101220065325.000|CCO|THE COUNTY JAIL FOR MONTHS, 
20101220065325.000|20101220065327.000|CCO|MAYBE YEARS, WAITING FOR THAT 
20101220065327.000|20101220065329.000|CCO|NEW TRIAL.
20101220065329.000|20101220065331.000|CCO|BUT THE DEFENSE WONDERED, SO 
20101220065331.000|20101220065332.667|CCO|MUCH HAD CHANGED OVER THE PAST 
20101220065332.667|20101220065334.333|CCO|DECADE.
20101220065334.333|20101220065336.000|CCO|WHAT EVIDENCE COULD PROSECUTORS 
20101220065336.000|20101220065337.667|CCO|EVEN USE AT TRIAL THIS TIME?
20101220065337.667|20101220065339.333|CCO|>> I JUST DON'T THINK YOU HAVE 
20101220065339.333|20101220065341.000|CCO|ANYTHING THAT LINKS SCOTT CANNON
20101220065341.000|20101220065343.000|CCO|TO THE SCENE ANYMORE. 
20101220065343.000|20101220065345.000|CCO|>> AFTER ALL, THE COMPARATIVE 
20101220065345.000|20101220065347.000|CCO|BULLET LEAD ANALYSIS THE JURY 
20101220065347.000|20101220065349.000|CCO|HAD FOUND SO COMPELLING IN THE 
20101220065349.000|20101220065351.000|CCO|FIRST TRIAL WAS NO LONGER 
20101220065351.000|20101220065353.000|CCO|CONSIDERED RELIABLE.
20101220065353.000|20101220065355.000|CCO|THE PROSECUTION'S CHIEF WITNESS,
20101220065355.000|20101220065357.000|CCO|BIMLA BOYD, WAS NOW A CONVICTED 
20101220065357.000|20101220065359.000|CCO|KILLER HERSELF, WHICH COULD MAKE
20101220065359.000|20101220065401.000|CCO|HER LESS CREDIBLE TO A JURY.
20101220065401.000|20101220065402.667|CCO|AND THE DEFENSE HAD TURNED UP 
20101220065402.667|20101220065404.333|CCO|NEW WITNESSES, TURNING TO 
20101220065404.333|20101220065406.000|CCO|PLAUSIBLE NEW SUSPECTS, LIKE TOM
20101220065406.000|20101220065407.667|CCO|McMAHON, THE SUSPECTED DRUG 
20101220065407.667|20101220065409.333|CCO|DEALING PARTNER OF MURDER VICTIM
20101220065409.333|20101220065411.000|CCO|JASON KINSER.
20101220065411.000|20101220065413.500|CCO|McMAHON'S PICTURE HAD TURNED UP 
20101220065413.500|20101220065416.000|CCO|IN A POLICE PHOTO ARRAY JUST 
20101220065416.000|20101220065418.500|CCO|HOURS AFTER THE MURDER.
20101220065418.500|20101220065421.000|CCO|AND AT LEAST TWO WITNESSES NOW 
20101220065421.000|20101220065422.667|CCO|SAID McMAHON HAD ADMITTED TO THE
20101220065422.667|20101220065424.333|CCO|KILLINGS. 
20101220065424.333|20101220065426.000|CCO|>> SO, MARK AND I GO IN FRONT OF
20101220065426.000|20101220065427.667|CCO|THE DISTRICT ATTORNEY OF POLK 
20101220065427.667|20101220065429.333|CCO|COUNTY AND FOR A COUPLE OF 
20101220065429.333|20101220065431.000|CCO|HOURS, MAKE THE CASE THAT THEY 
20101220065431.000|20101220065433.000|CCO|SHOULDN'T PROSECUTE SCOTT CANNON

20101220065435.000|20101220065437.000|CCO|>> THE PROBLEM WAS THAT HE 
20101220065437.000|20101220065439.000|CCO|HADN'T BEEN THERE WHEN THIS 
20101220065439.000|20101220065441.000|CCO|PROSECUTION HAPPENED.
20101220065441.000|20101220065442.429|CCO|ALL HE KNEW WAS THIS WAS ON HIS 
20101220065442.429|20101220065443.857|CCO|PLATE. 
20101220065443.857|20101220065445.286|CCO|>> YOU START TO THINK, MAN, IS 
20101220065445.286|20101220065446.714|CCO|THERE SOMETHING WE DON'T KNOW 
20101220065446.714|20101220065448.143|CCO|ABOUT?
20101220065448.143|20101220065449.571|CCO|DID WE MISS SOMETHING?
20101220065449.571|20101220065451.000|CCO|>> IT TURNS OUT IT WASN'T THE 
20101220065451.000|20101220065453.500|CCO|DEFENSE THAT HAD MISSED 
20101220065453.500|20101220065456.000|CCO|SOMETHING.
20101220065456.000|20101220065458.500|CCO|AS PROSECUTORS ANNOUNCED THEY 
20101220065458.500|20101220065501.000|CCO|WERE REVIEWING BOXES OF PHYSICAL
20101220065501.000|20101220065503.000|CCO|EVIDENCE LEFT OVER FROM THE 
20101220065503.000|20101220065505.000|CCO|FIRST TRIAL, A BOMBSHELL WAS 
20101220065505.000|20101220065507.000|CCO|ABOUT TO HIT THE HEADLINES.
20101220065507.000|20101220065509.000|CCO|AFTER CANNON'S NEW TRIAL WAS 
20101220065509.000|20101220065511.000|CCO|ORDERED, THE VICTIMS' FAMILIES 
20101220065511.000|20101220065513.000|CCO|RECEIVED PHONE CALLS FROM
